plan.reasoning: Selected meta-leads-sync because directive contains keywords matching 'Synchronizes lead data from Meta Ads (Facebook/Instagram) lead forms directly into Shopify customer records. Use this for Meta-based acquisition workflows.'.

result.error:
Command failed: node /Users/mac/Documents/JO-AAA/automations/templates/leads/sync-meta-leads-to-shopify.cjs --dry-run 
❌ Missing Meta credentials in .env

SETUP REQUIRED:
1. Create Meta App: https://developers.facebook.com/apps
2. Add app to Business Manager
3. Get Page Access Token with leads_retrieval permission
4. Get Lead Form ID from Ads Manager
5. Add to .env:
   META_PAGE_ACCESS_TOKEN=your_token
   META_PAGE_ID=your_page_id
   META_LEAD_FORM_ID=your_form_id
